001package com.github.sormuras.bach;
002
003import java.lang.module.ModuleDescriptor.Version;
004import java.util.LinkedList;
005import java.util.List;
006import java.util.Optional;
007
008/** All well-known options, usually parsed from command-line arguments. */
009public record Options(
010    MainOptions forMain,
011    ConfigurationOptions forConfiguration,
012    ProjectOptions forProject,
013    List<String> unhandledArguments) {
014
015  /** A group of optional components used by the main program. */
016  public record MainOptions(
017      Optional<Boolean> help, Optional<Boolean> version, Optional<Boolean> generateBuildProgram) {}
018
019  /** A group of optional components used as global settings of a {@link Configuration} instance. */
020  public record ConfigurationOptions(
021      Optional<Boolean> verbose, Optional<Boolean> lenient, Optional<Integer> timeout) {}
022
023  /** A group of optional components used when building a project model instance. */
024  public record ProjectOptions(Optional<String> name, Optional<Version> version) {}
025
026  /** Parses an array of strings in command-line style into an options instance. */
027  public static Options parse(String... args) {
028    return Options.parse(List.of(args));
029  }
030
031  public static Options parse(List<String> args) {
032    Boolean help = null;
033    Boolean version = null;
034    Boolean generateBuildProgram = null;
035    Boolean verbose = null;
036    Boolean lenient = null;
037    Integer timeout = null;
038    String projectName = null;
039    Version projectVersion = null;
040    var unhandled = new LinkedList<String>();
041    var arguments = new LinkedList<>(args);
042    while (!arguments.isEmpty()) {
043      var argument = arguments.pop();
044      switch (argument) {
045        case "--help", "/?" -> help = true;
046        case "--version" -> version = true;
047        case "--generate-build-program" -> generateBuildProgram = true;
048        case "--verbose" -> verbose = true;
049        case "--lenient" -> lenient = true;
050        case "--timeout" -> timeout = Integer.parseInt(arguments.pop());
051        case "--project-name" -> projectName = arguments.pop();
052        case "--project-version" -> projectVersion = Version.parse(arguments.pop());
053        default -> unhandled.add(argument);
054      }
055    }
056    return new Options(
057        new MainOptions(
058            Optional.ofNullable(help),
059            Optional.ofNullable(version),
060            Optional.ofNullable(generateBuildProgram)),
061        new ConfigurationOptions(
062            Optional.ofNullable(verbose),
063            Optional.ofNullable(lenient),
064            Optional.ofNullable(timeout)),
065        new ProjectOptions(Optional.ofNullable(projectName), Optional.ofNullable(projectVersion)),
066        List.copyOf(unhandled));
067  }
068}
